column1: 1$Condition: Attention Deficit Disorder with Hyperactivity$9/7/2013 12:18:01 PM$Reviewer: j
column2: 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient) $4$3$3$well it  is taken 3 times  before 6 inevening can have a kainda spike in your thoughts at times but it helps with awereness an function may cause you to talk out loud to your self about anything bottled up in you or get a little  of what ever  you may not say about how you feel really to anyone but over all it seems to get all the things off your mind then you seem to feel calmer later like tired but yet a weight is lifted off you on last dose but you have to try  to stay some what secluded from  certain people  an stuff that may trigger you  to say what ya think an people will not understand your illness witch I do not like to tell my problem because it really is privet so as I said I feel ok but you have to try to adjust to each schuation and you should in time I also am bipolar an phycofrenic it is tuff to deal with thongs an people are just not educated an you may just have to come to the grips with the fact they just may be encapable to under stand  you the thing that keeps me some what  ok is that  most people don't know many of us are very  awhere and extreamly smarter than most of them

45-54 Male  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient) $4$5$5$For Multiple Sclerosis fatigue. I take three 10mg tablets daily in the morning. I really helped with lack of concentration. But I discovered if I took it late in the day because I forgot to take it when I woke up
column3: I had a lot of trouble sleeping.

column1: 3$Condition: Attention Deficit Disorder with Hyperactivity$5/1/2009 2:08:25 PM$Reviewer:  Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $1$1$3$They put my 6 year old son on the patch 15mg and on the first day he was acting like he was high and couldn't focus on any thing. The Dr. said that it was to much for his body the fist time and so he changed him to 5 mg. ritlin . We will see how this does.
